glsa.title: abcm2ps: Buffer overflow vulnerability
glsa.synopsis: abcm2ps is vulnerable to a buffer overflow that could lead to remote execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: abcm2ps is a utility used to convert ABC music sheet files into PostScript format.

description.p: Limin Wang has located a buffer overflow inside the put_words() function in the abcm2ps code.

impact.p: A remote attacker could convince the victim to download a specially-crafted ABC file. Upon execution, this file would trigger the buffer overflow and lead to the execution of arbitrary code with the permissions of the user running abcm2ps.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
